-Ca1wV6l1paaFinQ9zdylw.review_text: Awesome bar!  Great drinks, and every weekend there is live music. Just a great place to come and get a pint with your friends.  Fair warning, this place does get super packed when there is a live band. Expect a line and a wait for a drink!

_QahN3-pFwLiZixM-KxBKg.review_text: This place is great! Nice spot to meet and chat with locals!  Katie the cute redhead bartender is awesome! She bought me my first beer for being new to the area...of course I bought many more, but she was so awesome and sweet! Really dug the vibe here.
